body.name: Konnek Stein Webcam HD 1080P Video, Buit-in Microphone, Computer USB Web Cam with Tripod and Privacy Cover, Plug and Play, PC Webcam for Video Calling, Conferencing, Compatible with Desktop, Laptop
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: Full HD1080P Video Webcam - 1080P web camera produces exceptionally sharp and clear videos at resolutions up to 1920x1080 30fps, it provides your excellent image, meet computer webcam provides for professional video streaming.

Built-in Noise Reduction Mic – Built-in noise to canceling microphone reduce ambient noise to enhance the sound quality of your video, even in noisy surroundings you can capture just the sounds you want.

USB Webcam Plug to Play - USB PC webcam is very easy to use, just plug and play, no additional driver required, USB connection makes it easy to work that meets your multiple angel needs on computers, laptops, desktops, the USB cable length is 4.60ft (140cm).

Webcam Privacy Cover – This pc webcam cover is an accessory of laptop webcam, it is perfect to provide privacy when not in use, and prevents web hackers from spying on you, also protect webcam len from scratches or damage.
Wide Compatibility - Windows 7, 8, 10 or higher, Mac OS 10.6 or higher. Compatible with Android V 5.0 or later. Compatible with Facebook, YouTube, Skype, Xbox One and xSplit applications.
Customer Service - Any questions please contact our customer support team, we will try our best to resolve the problems for you, you can find after-sell email address on instruction.
body.description: Operating system:Windows 7/8/10 or higher version.Mac OS 10.6 or higher version.One USB 2.0 port.Compatible with Facebook, YouTube, Skype, Xbox One and xSplit applications.XBOX and Play Station only support 720P.Connecting the Webcam:1. Connect the USB cable to the computer USB port, the LED indicator will show red light.2. Open video chat or recording application, select USB Camera as your video input and select USB Camera as your microphone input.3. Wile the camera is active(make sure you have select USB Camera in your video chat application), The LED indicator will show green light, Then you are good to use the webcam for chatting already.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: KONNEK STEIN 1080P Full HD Webcam Webcam with a microphone, 1080P full HD video quality and an enhanced capability image sensor, it has a wide 110°viewing angle, great for webinars, online courses and video conferencing. Its plug and play setup through the 2.0 USB interface makes it easy to get up and running without having to install additional drivers. The PC webcam with rotatable clip, you can put the webcam on any device, such us laptop, desktop. The PC Webcam come with the privacy cover, it can cover the lens when it is not in use which prevents web hackers from spying on you. System required: Windows 7,8 or 10 MacOS x10.7 or higher version One USB 2.0 port XBOX and play station only support 720P Compatible with Skype, Zoom, Facebook, YouTube and other chatting and recording software Working temperature: 41F°-131F° (5C°-50C°)

Clear Microphone & Noise-Canceling Built-in microphones with automatic noise reduction that makes more purer and clearer sound, pick up your voice even at 10ft distance to make sure everyone hears the real you. Wide Compatibility The webcam is compatible with Windows, Mac, Android, Skype, Facebook,YuTube and many other applications, You can easily use this web camera for online studying, conference, meeting, gaming, video calling and recording. 1080P High Resolution This PC web camera uses a 1080P HD lens, presenting a wonderful smooth video to you. Additionally, it has an ultra-wide 110° view angle, more things can be shown by this webcam easily.

Q: How do I know if my camera is recognized by the operating system? A: Connect the camera in any USB 2.0/3.0 port. Once the camera is connected, it takes few more moments before the camera is recognized. To ensure the camera has installed correctly, check the following: Under Control Panel > System and Security > System > Device Manager Q: How to improve image effect while my pc is used online? A: light plays an extremely important role in image quality, please adjust your web camera parameter to get better image according to different light condition. Q: Why my camera does not perform normally while used online? A: If your pluck your camera before stop your web camera online. the programme may be abnormal. Restart your computer it will be OK. Q: Why doesn't the image look like 1080P ? A: The camera itself is actually 1080P, but some video call software will compress the video quality. If further information or help needed, please contact our service team by email.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works just fine, was easy to set up, and was cheap
reviews.reviewText: It's last long too, since the pandemic and Zoom meetings started, and it's going strong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I bought this camera due to the pandemic and have to work from home, and so I can do some video conferencing with my office. It is very easy to set up, just plug and play for me. It also comes with a small tripod which works well for me. The video quality is like most of the camera out in the market right now 1080P at 30 fps. It also comes with a cap that you can flip up or down to provide physical privacy protection. The video quality is good when I am using it for both Zoom and Teams meeting. Overall, I'm satisfy with this product and would recommend it for this price and performance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice camera at a nice price
reviews.reviewText: This is a decent camera for the price. It has good picture quality overall. The first unit I received was defective where as the picture was actually reversed from the way it should have been and there was no control ability to change that. I made contact with the supplier immediately and they were back in touch with me in a very short time. A replacement was sent out and it worked the way I expected it to along with additional control features that the previous did not have. I can not say enough for the positive response I received from this supplier. I wish there were more like them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and works well
reviews.reviewText: Great value for the price! Mic quality is not really good though

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Couldn't beat it for the price! Looks sleek. My gaming laptop doesn't have a camera, and it is quite convenient if I taking online class on it. So this camera really helps me. I don't want to invest a lot because I don't use webcam a ton. The quality of this webcam is surprisingly good!! It has super clear vision and showing my face (hahaha) accurately. Very easy to use, just plug in and you can use it. Def will recommend this to my friend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good camera, Poor microphone
reviews.reviewText: For the price, the camera is good. It is better than using the camera built into the laptop. (Keep in mind, there is no zoom or other functionality.) The disappointment was that the microphone virtually non-functional. I was unable to get the sound levels above 10%.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact, Fair Quality, and Easy to Install
reviews.reviewText: I needed a camera for school and with that came the look for a cheaper option camera but with good quality. This was a good choice since it's a 1080p 30Fps (Normally 30fps wouldn't be ideal but for 30 bucks you can't really complain). I can't lie it doesn't have the greatest quality, it's kinda grainy but for school or zoom meetings this works wonderfully. 9/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor Image Quality
reviews.reviewText: Ordered a second camera for use with Zoom meetings. This one seemed fine and was very affordable. I installed it and was amazed at the poor results. I think if you were in a studio setting with perfect lighting it would be okay. But if your just setting it up for simple plug and play I'd look elsewhere. These two pictures are with the Zoom app running and Zoom auto-blurring the background. Most light is natural from a window on my right.
Great picture quality, plug n play design, took only seconds to set up.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very clear for low light environments
reviews.reviewText: Can't be happier with this purchase. I used to have a more expensive one but images had always seemed dark even during day time. This is bright & clear, yet not over-exposed. For the price, it is a top 1 quality.
Arrived on time, exactly as shown, easy setup and works great

This is a really great camera for the $17 I paid for it as an Amazon warehouse deal. However, I'm not sure I could recommend it at the full $50 asking price. The microphone on it is kinda mediocre - it picks up bassy lows very well, but not higher pitch. Also, the privacy filter is a good feature, but it's just a rubber cap made of a material that attracts dust and debris super easy. Would have preferred like some kind of sliding mechanism. I do really like the aesthetic design of the camera too.Overall though, if you just need a camera, this is a really solid choice. If you see it on sale, I definitely recommend it.
